author: Elvia Limon
description: Former President Obama said in a statement on Sunday that he was praying for those affected by the flash flooding in Texas over the past few days. “The flash flooding in Central Texas is absolutely heartbreaking. Michelle and I are praying for everyone who has lost a loved one or is waiting for news — especially…
title: Obama: Texas flash flooding ‘absolutely heartbreaking’

author: Brandon Conradis
description: President Trump on Sunday issued a lengthy Truth Social post attacking former ally Elon Musk after the Tesla mogul announced he was launching a third party over opposition to Trump’s “big, beautiful bill.” “I am saddened to watch Elon Musk go completely ‘off the rails,’ essentially becoming a TRAIN WRECK over the past five weeks,”…
title: Trump rages against Musk over third party, megabill opposition: ‘TRAIN WRECK’

author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Former President Bush issued a statement on Sunday expressing his sorrow over the loss of life in the dangerous flooding that affected his home state of Texas. “On this day of prayer, Laura and I are holding up our fellow Texans who are hurting,” Bush wrote in a statement. “We are heartbroken by the loss…
title: Bush ‘heartbroken by the loss of life’ in Texas floods

author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Rep. Tom Suozzi (D-N.Y.), a moderate Democrat, said President Trump and Democratic mayoral nominee Zohran Mamdani “tapped into the same thing” that catapulted their respective underdog campaigns to victory. In an interview on CBS News’s “Face the Nation,” Suozzi noted that both Trump and Mamdani, a democratic socialist who officially clinched the New York City…
title: Suozzi says Mamdani ‘tapped into the same thing’ as Trump

author: Tara Suter
description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear (D) said Sunday that Democrats “will have strong candidates” in governor’s races in rural states led by Republicans. “Your name frequently comes up as a contender for the 2028 Democratic primary for president. You said, ‘I’ll think about it after next year.’ What will make you decide that that’s going to…
title: Beshear: Democrats will ‘have strong candidates’ in rural states

author: Rachel Scully
description: Stephen Miran, chair of the White House Council of Economic Advisors, praised the tariff deal between the United States and Vietnam, calling it “extremely one-sided.” During an appearance on ABC News’s “This Week” on Sunday, Miran was asked about President Trump’s progress on tariff deals as he rapidly approaches his July 9 deadline. While he…
title: Miran: US, Vietnam deal ‘fantastic,’ ‘extremely one-sided’

author: Tara Suter
description: Rep. Joaquin Castro (D-Texas) said Sunday that climate change was “obviously a part of” the recent deadly flooding in Texas. “I think climate change is obviously a part of it. These floods are happening more often in more parts of the country, and really all over the world, and so we have to face that…
title: House Democrat says climate change ‘obviously a part of’ Texas flooding

author: Clint Bolick and G. Barry Anderson, opinion contributors
description: We fully endorse the NextGen exam as a rigorous, client-focused assessment of legal doctrine and lawyering skills that additionally serves to facilitate license portability across the U.S.
title: NextGen bar exam elevates legal competence, streamlines interstate practice

author: Gavin Oxley, opinion contributor
description: Women have been drugged by partners to force abortions. And the pill is routinely used to force victims of sex trafficking to abort.
title: Trump can shatter the abortion pill cartel

author: Tara Suter
description: Israel has said it is sending a delegation to Qatar for ceasefire talks with Hamas about the war in Gaza, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s office said on Saturday. “In light of an assessment of the situation, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has directed that the invitation to proximity talks be accepted and that the contacts for…
title: Israel sends delegation to Qatar for Gaza ceasefire talks with Hamas

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Authorities in Indianapolis say seven are injured and two were pronounced dead after a shooting early Saturday morning.  At around 1:27 a.m. local police responded to separate incidents at the intersection of West Washington and South Meridian streets, in addition to South Illinois and West Washington streets.  While responding to both calls, officers heard shots…
title: 7 injured, 2 killed in Indianapolis shooting

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk said Saturday he has officially formed the “America Party,” a third political faction to rival Democrats and Republicans. “By a factor of 2 to 1, you want a new political party and you shall have it. When it comes to bankrupting our country with waste & graft, we live in a…
title: Musk announces formation of ‘America Party’
